price: Nokorε sε, Yεsomaa nteamu baako pε na εbaa wͻn soͻ, na wͻbεyεε gͻsͻͻ tesε mmabaa a awoͻ na abubu asin-asin a εwͻ mmoa adidieε.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ʿalayhim ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fakānū kahashīmi al-muḥ'taẓiri
